title: May Good Things Happen!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Yaaay! I got a great blessing~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>That’s good. You have a promising future ahead of you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, thanks~. How about you, Maki-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I got a small blessing. It’s decent. I’ll go tie up mine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Can you lend me the strip for a bit?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eh? Sure, but....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Do this here, and that here.... Alright, done!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>What did you do?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I combined both of our fortunes. If we tie it up like this, I’m sure we’ll both get a medium blessing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eh!? Even though you got a great blessing, Kotori.... But, thank you. I’m sure it’ll be a great year for both of us.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
